title: `push` result behavior
body:
I just ran the command below to push data into a RIA sibling create with `create-sibling-ria`. I am using the code of #4203, please freshly merged master. So this is a combination of push from master and the special remote implementation from #4203.

Everything works out fine, but the UX is a bit weird. I get no response whatsoever, and then all this on command exit (after about 3min, and 23GB copied).

```
% dl push --to inm7 .                                                                                   
copy(ok): sub-220004/ses-1/mri/m0wp1sub-220004_ses-1.nii (file) [to inm7-storage...]
copy(ok): sub-220004/ses-1/report/cat_sub-220004_ses-1.mat (file) [to inm7-storage...]
copy(ok): sub-220004/ses-1/report/cat_sub-220004_ses-1.xml (file) [to inm7-storage...]
copy(ok): sub-220004/ses-1/report/catlog_sub-220004_ses-1.txt (file) [to inm7-storage...]
copy(ok): sub-220004/ses-2/mri/m0wp1sub-220004_ses-2.nii (file) [to inm7-storage...]
copy(ok): sub-220004/ses-2/report/cat_sub-220004_ses-2.mat (file) [to inm7-storage...]
copy(ok): sub-220004/ses-2/report/cat_sub-220004_ses-2.xml (file) [to inm7-storage...]
copy(ok): sub-220004/ses-2/report/catlog_sub-220004_ses-2.txt (file) [to inm7-storage...]
copy(ok): sub-220012/ses-1/mri/m0wp1sub-220012_ses-1.nii (file) [to inm7-storage...]
copy(ok): sub-220012/ses-1/report/cat_sub-220012_ses-1.mat (file) [to inm7-storage...]
  [6733 similar messages have been suppressed]                                                                                                                                      
publish(ok): . (dataset) [refs/heads/master->inm7:refs/heads/master [new branch]]
publish(ok): . (dataset) [refs/heads/git-annex->inm7:refs/heads/git-annex [new branch]]                                                                                             
datalad push --to inm7 .  45.49s user 68.22s system 60% cpu 3:07.59 total
```
